availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry Wilson Purdy (Marion County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of Daniel Purdy and Elizabeth Purdy. Married to Mattie A. Smithey Purdy. Father of Henry Purdy and Sallie Purdy. Resident of Marion County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident of Marion County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, p. 334A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, District No. 2, p. 663.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994050, Marion County Deaths.
